Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears. There are two ProfileIDs defined for the Transport Execution Plan Request. One profile is used when a request is expected, the other is used when no request message is expected. Possible choices are: "urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:transport_execution_plan_w_request:1" and "urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:transport_execution_plan_only:1".

Element.Name: Profile Execution ID
Element.Description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Dispatch advice issue date
Element.Description: The date when the Transport Execution Plan Request is issued. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD".

Element.Name: Dispatch advice issue time
Element.Description: The time when the Transport Execution Plan Request is issued.

Element.Name: Transport Execution Plan Request status code
Element.Description: A code signifying the status of the Transport Execution Plan Request. Default is Original (9)

Element.Name: Note
Element.Description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Element.Name: Transport User Remarks
Element.Description: Remarks from the transport user regarding the transport operations referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

Element.Name: Transport user party
Element.Description: The party requesting the transport services referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request and the party sending it.

Element.Name: Transport User party electronic address
Element.Description: The endpoint for the transport user party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for electronic address

Element.Name: Transport user party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the transport user party.

Element.Name: Transport user party name
Element.Description: The name of the transport user party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The postal address for the transport user party.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country sub entity
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: The tax information about the transport user party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: The Transport User Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Party Legal Entity
Element.Description: The party legal entity for the transport user party.

Element.Name: Transport user party name
Element.Description: The name of the transport user party.

Element.Name: Transport user parties legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the transport users legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The residens country for the transport user party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The contact of the transport user party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Transport service provider party
Element.Description: The party providing the transport services referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

Element.Name: Transport Service Provider party electronic address
Element.Description: The endpoint for the transport service provider party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for electronic address

Element.Name: Transport service provider party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Transport service provider party name
Element.Description: The name of the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The postal address for the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: The tax information about the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: The Transport Service Provider Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Party legal entity
Element.Description: The party legel entity of the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Transport service provider party name
Element.Description: The name of the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Transport service provider parties legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the transport users legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The residens country for the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The contact of the transport service provider party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Payee party
Element.Description: The party that will pay for the transport service(s) referred to in a Transport Execution Plan.

Element.Name: Payee party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the payee party.

Element.Name: Transport user party name
Element.Description: The name of the payee party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The postal address for the payee party.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: The tax information about the payee party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: The Payee Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Party Legal Entity
Element.Description: The party legal entity for the payee party.

Element.Name: Transport user party name
Element.Description: The name of the payee party.

Element.Name: Transport user parties legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the transport users legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The residens country for the transport user party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The contact of the payee party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: Reference to additional documents relevant for this Transport Execution Plan Request.

Element.Name: Identity of the reference
Element.Description: The reference number of added document

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: The type of reference. Must me part of UNCL1001

Element.Name: Document type
Element.Description: The type of reference that cannot be specified by a code

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.

Element.Name: Main Transportatin Service
Element.Description: A description of the main transportation service referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

Element.Name: Main Transportatin Service Code
Element.Description: A code signifying the extent of this transportation service (e.g., door-to-door, port-to-port).

Element.Name: Main Transportatin Service Description
Element.Description: Text describing the transportation service.

Element.Name: Additional Transportatin Service
Element.Description: A description of an additional transportation service referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request. Can only be used in conjunction with a main transportation service.

Element.Name: Main Transportatin Service Code
Element.Description: A code signifying the extent of this transportation service (e.g., door-to-door, port-to-port).

Element.Name: Main Transportation Service Description
Element.Description: Text describing the transportation service.

Element.Name: Consignment information
Element.Description: An identifiable collection of goods items sent from one party (the Despatch Party) to another party (the Consignee) via one or more modes of transport.

Element.Name: Consignment identifier
Element.Description: Id for the consignment, often a number from the Transport Service provider. If this ID is in the GINC format, it should be indicated in the attribute @schemeID. Use N/A if not applicable.

Attribute.Description: Used to indicate that the ID is in the GINC (Global Identification Number for Consignment) format. This number identifies a consignment, which is a logical grouping of goods (one or more logistics units) transferred to a freight forwarder to be transported for a specific journey. The consignment number must be allocated by a freight forwarder (or a carrier acting as a freight forwarder) or a consignor, but only if prior agreement of the freight forwarder is given.

Element.Name: Consignee reference
Element.Description: ID or reference used by the consignee to identify this consignment.

Element.Name: Consignor reference
Element.Description: ID or reference used by the consignor to identify this consignment.

Element.Name: Declared Customs Value Amount
Element.Description: The total declared value for customs purposes of all the goods in this consignment, regardless of whether they are subject to the same customs procedure, tariff/statistical categorization, country information, or duty regime.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: Currency identifier.

Element.Name: Consignment gross weight
Element.Description: The gross weight of the consignment as a whole. Must be equal the sum of the gross weight specified for the included transport handling unites if this is specified

Element.Name: Consignment gross volume
Element.Description: The gross volumen of the consignment. Must be greather or equal the the volumen specified for the included transport handling unites if this is specified

Element.Name: Loading length measure
Element.Description: The total length in a means of transport or a piece of transport equipment which, given the width and height of the transport means, will accommodate all of the consignments in a single consolidation.

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Total number of transport handling units
Element.Description: The total number of transport handling units for this consignment.

Element.Name: Customs Declaration
Element.Description: A class describing identifiers or references relating to customs procedures.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: An identifier associated with customs related procedures.

Element.Name: Function Code
Element.Description: A code describing the function of this customs declaration.

Element.Name: Validity Period
Element.Description: The period during which this customs declaration is valid.

Element.Name: Start Date
Element.Description: The first date of the period.

Element.Name: Customs party
Element.Description: The authority responsible for processing this customs declaration

Element.Name: Customs party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the Customs party.

Element.Name: Customs party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the Customs party.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: The name of the customs party.

Element.Name: Customs party name
Element.Description: The name of the customs party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The postal address for the customs party.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country sub entity
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country code of the customs party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: The tax information about the transport user party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: The Transport User Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Party Legal Entity
Element.Description: The party legal entity for the transport user party.

Element.Name: Transport user party name
Element.Description: The name of the transport user party.

Element.Name: Transport user parties legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the transport users legal registration identifier

Element.Name: Legal address
Element.Description: The official address of the customs party.

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The residens country for the customs party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The contact of the transport user party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Additional Document Reference
Element.Description: A reference to additional documents and/or objects relevant or related to this customs declaration.

Element.Name: Identity
Element.Description: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: The type of reference. Must me part of UNCL1001

Element.Name: Document type
Element.Description: The type of reference that cannot be specified by a code

Element.Name: Requested pickup transport event
Element.Description: The pickup of this consignment requested by the party requesting a transportation service (the transport user). Mandatory if the Requested delivery transport event is not specified.

Element.Name: Identifier pickup transport event
Element.Description: An identifier for this pickup transport event within an agreed event identification scheme.

Element.Name: Location of requested pickup
Element.Description: The location where the pickup takes place.

Element.Name: Identity of the pickup location
Element.Description: Identifies the pickup location.

Element.Name: Name of the pickup location
Element.Description: The name of the pickup location.

Element.Name: Address of location
Element.Description: Location address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Altitude
Element.Description: The Z coordinate.

Attribute.Name: Altitude unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to altitude.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The period within the pickup event takes place.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The start date for the pickup event.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time for the pickup event.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The end date for the pickup event.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time for the pickup event.

Element.Name: Requested delivery transport event
Element.Description: The delivery of this consignment requested by the party requesting a transportation service (the transport user). Mandatory if the requested pickup transpoinrt event is not present.

Element.Name: Identifier delivery transport event
Element.Description: An identifier for this delivery transport event within an agreed event identification scheme.

Element.Name: Location of requested delivery
Element.Description: The location of the requested delivery.

Element.Name: Identity of the delivery location
Element.Description: Identifies the delivery location.

Element.Name: Name of the delivery location
Element.Description: The name of the delivery location.

Element.Name: Address of the location
Element.Description: Location Address.

Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Description: The period within the delivery event takes place.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The start date for the delivery event.

Element.Description: The start time for the delivery event.

Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country sub entity
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country code of the carrier party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party legal entity
Element.Description: The legal name of the carrier party.

Element.Name: Carrier party name
Element.Description: The name of the carrier party.

Element.Name: Carrier parties legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the carrier legal registration identifier

Element.Name: Legal address
Element.Description: The official address of the carrier party.

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The residens country for the carrier party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The contact of the Carrier party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact email telephone
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Person
Element.Description: The driver or master person for the carrier party.

Element.Name: Identity Document Reference
Element.Description: Reference to an identity of the driver or master person.

Element.Name: ID
Element.Description: The ID of identity the person for instance a driver license number.

Element.Name: Document Type
Element.Description: The type of identity for instance a driver license.

Element.Name: Original departure country
Element.Description: The country from which the goods in this consignment were originally exported, without any commercial transaction taking place in intermediate countries.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Final destination country
Element.Description: The country in which the goods in this consignment are to be delivered to the final consignee or buyer.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Transport event
Element.Description: A class to describe a significant occurrence or happening related to the transportation of goods.

Element.Name: Location of the event
Element.Description: The location where the event takes place.

Element.Name: Identity of the event location
Element.Description: Identifies the event location.

Element.Name: Name of the event location
Element.Description: The name of the event location.

Element.Name: Address of location
Element.Description: Location address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: Third address line.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Altitude
Element.Description: The Z coordinate.

Attribute.Name: Altitude unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to altitude.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The period within the event takes place.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The start date for the event.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time for the event.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The end date for the event.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time for the event.

Element.Name: Delivery terms
Element.Description: The conditions agreed upon between a seller and a buyer with regard to the delivery of goods and/or services (e.g., CIF, FOB, or EXW from the INCOTERMS Terms of Delivery).

Element.Name: Delivery terms identification
Element.Description: Delivery terms code (Inco terms).

Element.Name: Special terms
Element.Description: Special delivery terms that exceeds the inco terms.

Element.Name: Location of attchaed to the delivery terms
Element.Description: The location where the pickup takes place.

Element.Name: Identity of the location
Element.Description: Identifies the location.

Element.Name: Name of the location
Element.Description: The name of the location.

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: The terms of payment between the parties (such as logistics service client, logistics service provider) in a transaction as related to the reqested transport service.

Element.Name: Payment terms identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this set of payment terms.

Element.Name: Payment terms note
Element.Description: A free text describing this set of payment terms.

Element.Name: Freight Allowance Charge
Element.Description: A cost incurred by the shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage for this consignment. In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

Element.Name: ChargeIndication
Element.Description: An indicator that this AllowanceCharge describes a charge (true) or a discount (false).

Element.Name: Allowance Charge Reason Code
Element.Description: A code signifying this freight allowance or charge.

Element.Name: Amount
Element.Description: The amount for this allowance or charge.

Element.Name: Main carriage shipment stage
Element.Description: The shipment stage during main carriage.

Element.Name: Transport mode code
Element.Description: A code signifying the method of transport used for this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Transport Means
Element.Description: The means of transport used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Registration Nationality ID
Element.Description: The country where the Transport Means is registred.

Element.Name: Air transport
Element.Description: An aircraft used in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Air transport identifier
Element.Description: An identifer for a specific aircraft.

Element.Name: Road transport
Element.Description: Description of a truck or a vehicle transporting the goods. Use only if Transport mode code is set to road transport

Element.Name: License plate identifier transport
Element.Description: The licence plate(s) identifying the vehicle seperated by semicolon if there are more than one.

Element.Name: Rail transport
Element.Description: Equipment used for rail transport in this shipment stage.

Element.Name: Train identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the train used as the means of transport.

Element.Name: Rail car identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the rail car on the train used as the means of transport..

Element.Name: Maritime transport
Element.Description: Description of a truck or a vehicle transporting the goods. Use only if TransportModeCode is set to maritime transport.

Element.Name: Vessel identifier
Element.Description: The registred identifier of the vessel

Element.Name: Requested departure transport event
Element.Description: The departure requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

Element.Name: Identifier departure transport event
Element.Description: An identifier for this departure transport event within an agreed event identification scheme.

Element.Name: Shipment departure location
Element.Description: The location where the departure of this shipment stage takes place.

Element.Name: Identity of the delivery location
Element.Description: Identifies the delivery location with e.g. UN Loco code

Element.Name: Name of the location
Element.Description: The name of the consignee.

Element.Name: The adress of the loaction
Element.Description: Postal Address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Altitude
Element.Description: The Z coordinate.

Attribute.Name: Altitude unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to altitude.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The period within the departure of this transport event takes place.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The start date for the period.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time for the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The end date for the period.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time for the period.

Element.Name: Requested arrival transport event
Element.Description: The arrival requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

Element.Name: Identifier arrival transport event
Element.Description: An identifier for this arrival transport event within an agreed event identification scheme.

Element.Name: Arrival location
Element.Description: The location where the arrival takes place.

Element.Name: Identity of the delivery location
Element.Description: Identifies the delivery location.

Element.Name: Name of arrival location
Element.Description: The name of the location.

Element.Name: Address of the arrival location
Element.Description: The address of the arrival location.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The period within the departure of this transport event takes place.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The start date for the period.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time for the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The end date for the period.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time for the period.

Element.Name: Transport handling unit
Element.Description: Used to specify how the goods is packed.

Element.Name: Identifier transport handling unit
Element.Description: The Transport Handling Unit is identified with a Serial Shipping Container Code (SSCC). The GS1 identification key used to identify logistics units. The key comprises an extension digit, GS1 Company Prefix, serial reference and check digit.

Element.Name: Handling unit type code
Element.Description: Type of Transport Handling Unit. Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21 with addition of the codes used by "Retursystem Byggpall".

Element.Name: Handling Code
Element.Description: The handling for this transporthandling unit expressed as a code

Element.Name: Handling instructions
Element.Description: The handling for this transporthandling unit expressed as a text

Element.Name: Handling unit hazardous indicator
Element.Description: An indicator that the materials contained in this transport handling unit are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Shipping marks
Element.Description: Free-form description of the marks and numbers on this transport handling unit.

Element.Name: Transport equipment
Element.Description: Used to specify Transport Equipment details associated with this Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Identifier transport equipment
Element.Description: An id for the physical transport equipment e.g. a container number.

Element.Name: Tranport equipment type code
Element.Description: An code specifying the type of equipment.

Element.Name: Size type code
Element.Description: A code signifying the size and type of this piece of piece of transport equipment. When the piece of transport equipment is a shipping container, it is recommended to use ContainerSizeTypeCode for validation.

Element.Name: Indicator refrigeration transport equipment
Element.Description: An indicator that this piece of transport equipment's refrigeration is on (true) or off (false).

Element.Name: Description transport equipment
Element.Description: A textual description of the transport equipment.
Element.Value: A 20 foot refrigerated container that is not actively controlling temperature of the product.

Element.Name: Power indicator transport equipment
Element.Description: An indicator that this piece of transport equipment can supply power (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Measurement dimension
Element.Description: Used to specify any measurement of the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: To describe the type of measurement. Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: For the measure. Use UN/ECE Recommendation 20 and 21.subset.

Element.Name: Minimum temperature
Element.Description: Used to specify the minimal temperature for the transport handling unit under the transport.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: To describe the type of messure that in this context is the minimal temperature.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: The value of the minimal temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Maximum temperature
Element.Description: Used to specify the maximum temperature for the transport handling unit under the transport.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: To describe the type of messure that in this context is the maximal temperature.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: The value of the maximum temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Goods item
Element.Description: A Goods item contained in the transport handling unit.

Element.Name: Identifiser goods item
Element.Description: An identifier for this goods item.

Element.Name: Sequence number ID
Element.Description: A sequence number differentiating a specific goods item within a consignment.

Element.Name: Description
Element.Description: A textual descript this goods item.
Element.Value: Torsk sl u/h fersk fulliset 20kg iso 2-4 kg

Element.Name: Hazardous risk indicator
Element.Description: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: Description of the product beeing transported.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The name of the Item.

Element.Name: Commodity classification
Element.Description: To classify when an item number is not sufficient.

Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier.

Element.Name: Hazardous item information
Element.Description: Contains information on the Hazardous item.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for this hazardous item.

Element.Name: Additional Information
Element.Description: Text providing further information about the hazardous substance.

Element.Name: Hazardous item UNDG code
Element.Description: The identifier assigned to transportable hazardous goods by the United Nations, expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Technical Name
Element.Description: The full technical name of a specific hazardous substance contained in this goods item.
Element.Value: Corrosive liquid, n.o.s., 8, UN 1760, II (contains Octanoyl chloride)

Element.Name: Category Name
Element.Description: The name of the category of hazard that applies to the Item.

Element.Name: Hazardous Category Code
Element.Description: A code signifying a kind of hazard for a material.

Element.Name: Haszardous hazard class Identifier
Element.Description: dentifies a hazard class applicable to dangerous goods as defined by the relevant regulation authority, such as the IMDG Class Number of the SOLAS Convention ofIMO and the ADR/RID Class Number for the road/rail environment.

Element.Name: Net Weight Measure
Element.Description: Net weight of the Hazardous item.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Net Weight.

Element.Name: Net Volume Measure
Element.Description: Net volume of the Hazardous item.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Net Volume.

Element.Name: Hazardous Goods Transit
Element.Description: Information related to the transit of this kind of hazardous goods.

Element.Name: Packing Criteria Code
Element.Description: A code signifying the packaging requirement for transportation of the hazardous goods as assigned by IATA, IMDB, ADR, RID etc.

Element.Name: Emergency Temperature
Element.Description: The threshold temperature at which emergency procedures apply in the handling of temperature-controlled goods.

Element.Name: Attribute ID
Element.Description: An identifier for this temperature measurement.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: The value of this temperature measurement.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the Emergency Temperature.

Element.Name: Shipment Document Reference
Element.Description: Reference to Shipment documents.

Element.Name: Identity of the Shipment document
Element.Description: Identifies the Shipment document.

Element.Name: Document Type Code
Element.Description: Defines the type of document using a code.

Element.Name: Document Type
Element.Description: Defines the type of document using a name.

Element.Name: Location of Office of Entry
Element.Description: The location where the border is crossed.

Element.Name: Identity of the bordercrossing location
Element.Description: Identifies the bordercrossing location.

Element.Name: Name of the bordercrossing location
Element.Description: The name of the bordercrossing location.

Element.Name: Address of location
Element.Description: Location address.

Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Countrycode of the location

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Location coordinate
Element.Description: To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate system code
Element.Description: Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude degrees
Element.Description: The X coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Latitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the latitude degrees.

Element.Name: Longitude degrees
Element.Description: The Y coordinate. Use degrees with decimals.

Attribute.Name: Longitude degrees unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the longitude degrees.

Element.Name: Altitude
Element.Description: The Z coordinate.

Attribute.Name: Altitude unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to altitude.

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: Reference to documents relevant for this Transport Execution Plan Request.

Element.Name: Identity of the reference
Element.Description: The reference number of added document

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: The type of reference. Must me part of UNCL1001

Element.Name: Document type
Element.Description: The type of reference that cannot be specified by a code
